i read that they come from greater darkbones...
----- Original Message -----
From: Shadowwalker
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, October 21, 1999 10:22 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] New Quests


I just had a question. I have been working on the new quests (Acumen's Mask at the moment) and I have killed about 15 darkbone skeletons and 1 greater darkbone skeleton and still have not seen a darkbone skull. Has anyone else gotten this loot item yet, and if so, do I just need to keep killing more darkbones, more greater darkbones, or something special?

-Shadowwalker
